member.name: T:Castle.Facilities.IBatisNetIntegration.NoSessionAttribute
member.summary: Declares that a method does not want to use automatic session creation.

member.name: T:Castle.Facilities.IBatisNetIntegration.SessionAttribute
member.summary: Declares that a component wants to use a specific IBatis DataMapper Instance.

member.name: T:Castle.Facilities.IBatisNetIntegration.UsesAutomaticSessionCreationAttribute
member.summary: Declares that a component wants to use an IBatis's Data Mapper session.
